title: Kundan and Tourmaline Chandbali Earrings - Adorable Andhra Style!
materials: Pink Tourmaline Drop. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: Elegant Chandbali design featuring a central square Kundan stone surrounded by smaller stones in a floral halo. A unique carved green tourmaline adds a modern touch, finished with a delicate pink tourmaline drop. Intricate stone setting showcases exceptional craftsmanship.
occasions: or any special occasion. Also suitable for modern cocktail parties and formal events.
description: This exquisite pair blends traditional Kundan craftsmanship with the contemporary appeal of carved tourmaline. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a radiant shine that will last for generations. A timeless piece that bridges tradition and modern style, making it a treasured addition to your jewelry collection.
